 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָכַר‎</span> **verb** ==stir up, disturb, trouble== (Late Hebrew ***id., make turbid***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be turbid***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.14.29|1Sam 14:29]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲכַרְתָּ֔נִי‎</span> [[Josh.7.25|Josh 7:25]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְכָּרְךָ‎</span> v[[Josh.7.25|Josh 7:25]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹכֵר‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.17|1Kgs 18:17]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺכֵר‎</span> [[1Chr.2.7|1Chr 2:7]] plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹכְרָ֑י‎</span> [[Judg.11.35|Judg 11:35]] — ***disturb, trouble***, with accusative of person [[Gen.34.30|Gen 34:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Josh.6.18|Josh 6:18]]; [[Josh.7.25|Josh 7:25]] (twice in verse) (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; v[[Josh.7.25|Josh 7:25]] b subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Judg.11.35|Judg 11:35]] compare [[Prov.11.17|Prov 11:17]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֹּמֵל‎</span>), v[[Prov.11.29|Prov 11:29]]; [[Prov.15.27|Prov 15:27]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָיָה‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂרָאֵל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.17|1Kgs 18:17]]; [[1Kgs.18.18|1Kgs 18:18]]; [[1Chr.2.7|1Chr 2:7]] (compare [[Josh.7.18|Josh 7:18]] etc., above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.14.29|1Sam 14:29]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּכְאֵבִי נֶעְכָּ֑ר‎</span> [[Ps.39.3|Ps 39:3]] ***my pain was stirred up***; ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְכָּ֑רֶת‎</span> [[Prov.15.6|Prov 15:6]] usually as abstract noun ***disturbance, calamity***, but &lt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְבוּאַת רָשָׁע‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span>]<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכְרָ֑ת‎</span> ***the income of the wicked is cut off*** (Toy).
